00067 // ===========================================================================
00068 // method definitions
00069 // ===========================================================================
00070 void
00071 fillOptions() {
00072     OptionsCont& oc = OptionsCont::getOptions();
00073     oc.addCallExample("-c <CONFIGURATION>");
00074 
00075     // insert options sub-topics
00076     SystemFrame::addConfigurationOptions(oc); // fill this subtopic, too
00077     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Input");
00078     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Output");
00079     GeoConvHelper::addProjectionOptions(oc);
00080     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Pruning");
00081     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Processing");
00082     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Building Defaults");
00083     SystemFrame::addReportOptions(oc); // fill this subtopic, too
00084 
00085 
00086     // register options
00087     // add i/o options
00088     // original network
00089     oc.doRegister("net-file", 'n', new Option_FileName());
00090     oc.addSynonyme("net-file", "net");
00091     oc.addDescription("net-file", "Input", "Loads SUMO-network FILE as reference to offset and projection");
00092 
00093     // dlrnavteq import
00094     oc.doRegister("dlr-navteq-poly-files", new Option_FileName());
00095     oc.addDescription("dlr-navteq-poly-files", "Input", "Reads polygons from FILE assuming they're coded in DLR-Navteq (Elmar)-format");
00096     oc.doRegister("dlr-navteq-poi-files", new Option_FileName());
00097     oc.addDescription("dlr-navteq-poi-files", "Input", "Reads pois from FILE+ assuming they're coded in DLR-Navteq (Elmar)-format");
00098 
00099     // visum import
00100     oc.doRegister("visum-files", new Option_FileName());
00101     oc.addSynonyme("visum-files", "visum");
00102     oc.addDescription("visum-files", "Input", "Reads polygons from FILE assuming it's a Visum-net");
00103 
00104     // xml import
00105     oc.doRegister("xml-files", new Option_FileName());
00106     oc.addSynonyme("xml-files", "xml");
00107     oc.addDescription("xml-files", "Input", "Reads pois and shapes from FILE assuming they're coded in XML");
00108 
00109     // osm import
00110     oc.doRegister("osm-files", new Option_FileName());
00111     oc.addSynonyme("osm-files", "osm");
00112     oc.addDescription("osm-files", "Input", "Reads pois from FILE+ assuming they're coded in OSM");
00113     oc.doRegister("osm.keep-full-type", new Option_Bool(false));
00114     oc.addDescription("osm.keep-full-type", "Input", "The type will be made of the key-value - pair.");
00115     oc.doRegister("osm.use-name", new Option_Bool(false));
00116     oc.addDescription("osm.use-name", "Input", "The id will be set from the given 'name' attribute.");
00117 
00118     // arcview import
00119     oc.doRegister("shapefile-prefixes", new Option_FileName());
00120     oc.addSynonyme("shapefile-prefixes", "shapefile-prefix");
00121     oc.addSynonyme("shapefile-prefixes", "shapefile");
00122     oc.addSynonyme("shapefile-prefixes", "shape-files", true);
00123     oc.addDescription("shapefile-prefixes", "Input", "Reads shapes from shapefiles FILE+");
00124 
00125     oc.doRegister("shapefile.guess-projection", new Option_Bool(false));
00126     oc.addSynonyme("shapefile.guess-projection", "arcview.guess-projection", true);
00127     oc.addDescription("shapefile.guess-projection", "Input", "Guesses the shapefile's projection");
00128 
00129     oc.doRegister("shapefile.id-column", new Option_FileName());
00130     oc.addSynonyme("shapefile.id-column", "shapefile.id-name", true);
00131     oc.addSynonyme("shapefile.id-column", "shape-files.id-name", true);
00132     oc.addDescription("shapefile.id-column", "Input", "Defines in which column the id can be found");
00133 
00134     // typemap reading
00135     oc.doRegister("type-file", new Option_FileName());
00136     oc.addSynonyme("type-file", "typemap", true);
00137     oc.addDescription("type-file", "Input", "Reads types from FILE");
00138 
00139 
00140     // output
00141     oc.doRegister("output-file", 'o', new Option_FileName("polygons.xml"));
00142     oc.addSynonyme("output-file", "output");
00143     oc.addDescription("output-file", "Output", "Write generated polygons/pois to FILE");
00144 
00145 
00146     // prunning options
00147     oc.doRegister("prune.in-net", new Option_Bool(false));
00148     oc.addSynonyme("prune.in-net", "prune.on-net", true);
00149     oc.addDescription("prune.in-net", "Pruning", "Enables pruning on net boundaries");
00150 
00151     oc.doRegister("prune.in-net.offsets", new Option_String("0,0,0,0"));
00152     oc.addSynonyme("prune.in-net.offsets", "prune.on-net.offsets", true);
00153     oc.addDescription("prune.in-net.offsets", "Pruning", "Uses STR as offset definition added to the net boundaries");
00154 
00155     oc.doRegister("prune.boundary", new Option_String());
00156     oc.addDescription("prune.boundary", "Pruning", "Uses STR as pruning boundary");
00157 
00158     oc.doRegister("prune.keep-list", new Option_String());
00159     oc.addSynonyme("prune.keep-list", "prune.keep");
00160     oc.addSynonyme("prune.keep-list", "prune.ignore", true);
00161     oc.addDescription("prune.keep-list", "Pruning", "Items in STR will be kept though out of boundary");
00162 
00163     oc.doRegister("prune.explicit", new Option_String(""));
00164     oc.addSynonyme("prune.explicit", "remove");
00165     oc.addDescription("prune.explicit", "Pruning", "Items with names in STR will be removed");
00166 
00167 
00168     oc.doRegister("offset.x", new Option_Float(0));
00169     oc.addSynonyme("offset.x", "x-offset-to-apply", true);
00170     oc.addDescription("offset.x", "Processing", "Adds FLOAT to net x-positions");
00171 
00172     oc.doRegister("offset.y", new Option_Float(0));
00173     oc.addSynonyme("offset.y", "y-offset-to-apply", true);
00174     oc.addDescription("offset.y", "Processing", "Adds FLOAT to net y-positions");
00175 
00176 
00177     // building defaults options
00178     oc.doRegister("color", new Option_String("0.2,0.5,1."));
00179     oc.addDescription("color", "Building Defaults", "Sets STR as default color");
00180 
00181     oc.doRegister("prefix", new Option_String(""));
00182     oc.addDescription("prefix", "Building Defaults", "Sets STR as default prefix");
00183 
00184     oc.doRegister("type", new Option_String("unknown"));
00185     oc.addDescription("type", "Building Defaults", "Sets STR as default type");
00186 
00187     oc.doRegister("layer", new Option_Integer(-1));
00188     oc.addDescription("layer", "Building Defaults", "Sets INT as default layer");
00189 
00190     oc.doRegister("discard", new Option_Bool(false));
00191     oc.addDescription("discard", "Building Defaults", "Sets default action to discard");
00192 }
00193 
00194 
00195 int
00196 main(int argc, char** argv) {
00197     OptionsCont& oc = OptionsCont::getOptions();
00198     oc.setApplicationDescription("Importer of polygons and POIs for the road traffic simulation SUMO.");
00199     oc.setApplicationName("polyconvert", "SUMO polyconvert Version " + (std::string)VERSION_STRING);
00200     int ret = 0;
00201     try {
00202         // initialise subsystems
00203         XMLSubSys::init(false);
00204         fillOptions();
00205         OptionsIO::getOptions(true, argc, argv);
00206         if (oc.processMetaOptions(argc < 2)) {
00207             SystemFrame::close();
00208             return 0;
00209         }
00210         MsgHandler::initOutputOptions();
00211         // build the projection
00212         Boundary origNetBoundary, pruningBoundary;
00213         Position netOffset;
00214         std::string proj;
00215         PCNetProjectionLoader::loadIfSet(oc, netOffset, origNetBoundary, pruningBoundary, proj);
00216         if (proj != "") {
00217             if (oc.isDefault("proj")) {
00218                 oc.set("proj", proj);
00219             }
00220             if (oc.isDefault("offset.x")) {
00221                 oc.set("offset.x", toString(netOffset.x()));
00222             }
00223             if (oc.isDefault("offset.y")) {
00224                 oc.set("offset.y", toString(netOffset.y()));
00225             }
00226         }
00227 #ifdef HAVE_PROJ
00228         unsigned numProjections = oc.getBool("simple-projection") + oc.getBool("proj.utm") + oc.getBool("proj.dhdn") + (oc.getString("proj").length() > 1);
00229         if ((oc.isSet("osm-files") || oc.isSet("dlr-navteq-poly-files") || oc.isSet("dlr-navteq-poi-files")) && numProjections == 0) {
00230             oc.set("proj.utm", "true");
00231         }
00232         if ((oc.isSet("dlr-navteq-poly-files") || oc.isSet("dlr-navteq-poi-files")) && oc.isDefault("proj.scale")) {
00233             oc.set("proj.scale", std::string("5"));
00234         }
00235 #endif
00236         if (!GeoConvHelper::init(oc)) {
00237             throw ProcessError("Could not build projection!");
00238         }
00239 
00240         // check whether the input shall be pruned
00241         bool prune = false;
00242         if (oc.getBool("prune.in-net")) {
00243             if (!oc.isSet("net")) {
00244                 throw ProcessError("In order to prune the input on the net, you have to supply a network.");
00245             }
00246             bool ok = true;
00247             // !!! no proper error handling
00248             Boundary offsets = GeomConvHelper::parseBoundaryReporting(oc.getString("prune.in-net.offsets"), "--prune.on-net.offsets", 0, ok);
00249             pruningBoundary = Boundary(
00250                                   pruningBoundary.xmin() + offsets.xmin(),
00251                                   pruningBoundary.ymin() + offsets.ymin(),
00252                                   pruningBoundary.xmax() + offsets.xmax(),
00253                                   pruningBoundary.ymax() + offsets.ymax());
00254             prune = true;
00255         }
00256         if (oc.isSet("prune.boundary")) {
00257             bool ok = true;
00258             // !!! no proper error handling
00259             pruningBoundary = GeomConvHelper::parseBoundaryReporting(oc.getString("prune.boundary"), "--prune.boundary", 0, ok);
00260             prune = true;
00261         }
00262 
00263         PCPolyContainer toFill(prune, pruningBoundary, oc.getStringVector("remove"));
00264 
00265         // read in the type defaults
00266         PCTypeMap tm;
00267         if (oc.isSet("type-file")) {
00268             PCTypeDefHandler handler(oc, tm);
00269             if (!XMLSubSys::runParser(handler, oc.getString("type-file"))) {
00270                 // something failed
00271                 throw ProcessError();
00272             }
00273         }
00274 
00275         // read in the data
00276         PCLoaderXML::loadIfSet(oc, toFill, tm); // SUMO-XML
00277         PCLoaderOSM::loadIfSet(oc, toFill, tm); // OSM-XML
00278         PCLoaderDlrNavteq::loadIfSet(oc, toFill, tm); // Elmar-files
00279         PCLoaderVisum::loadIfSet(oc, toFill, tm); // VISUM
00280         PCLoaderArcView::loadIfSet(oc, toFill, tm); // shape-files
00281         // check whether any errors occured
00282         if (!MsgHandler::getErrorInstance()->wasInformed()) {
00283             // no? ok, save
00284             toFill.save(oc.getString("output-file"));
00285         } else {
00286             throw ProcessError();
00287         }
00288     } catch (ProcessError& e) {
00289         if (std::string(e.what()) != std::string("Process Error") && std::string(e.what()) != std::string("")) {
00290             WRITE_ERROR(e.what());
00291         }
00292         MsgHandler::getErrorInstance()->inform("Quitting (on error).", false);
00293         ret = 1;
00294 #ifndef _DEBUG
00295     } catch (...) {
00296         MsgHandler::getErrorInstance()->inform("Quitting (on unknown error).", false);
00297         ret = 1;
00298 #endif
00299     }
00300     SystemFrame::close();
00301     // report about ending
00302     if (ret == 0) {
00303         std::cout << "Success." << std::endl;
00304     }
00305     return ret;
00306 }
